short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get bite-sized mental and physical well-being tips whenever you open a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Looking for a simple way to boost your wellness every day? Mind Body Tab, a Chrome extension, offers bite-sized prompts in your browser.

Each new tab provides a fresh prompt to help you feel energised and ready to tackle the day. Whether you're stuck at a desk or powering through a busy workday, Mind Body Tab offers quick and effective boosts to help you succeed.

Plus, you can easily share your wellness tips with friends on Twitter without pesky ads. Think of it as having a personal wellness coach cheering you on.

Ready to upgrade your wellness game? Give Mind Body Tab a try and see how it can improve your life.

This plugin contains:
• Health & well-being prompts 
• Tips for a healthier you
• A link to share any tip on Twitter
• An option to toggle between light & dark mode
